ProjectTitle: Unravelling neuron-glia interactions in Wolfram syndrome through optic nerve-on-chip and in vivo base editing
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/06/2022
4. Metadata: Upon deposit EBI-ENA or NCBI-SRA will apply metadata, best to already familiarize yourself with their guidelines to make sure to document the data according to their guidelines to save time when depositing. You can write here that you use their standards. 
5. Preservation: Please note that the KU Leuven policy asks for 10 years of data preservation (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy)
7. Sharing: Please use EBI (or other repositories based in Europe) for sharing of data derived from human samples.
label: good with suggestions
